name: Warhol vs Poggers
description:
We had a blast building the game from scratch within 48 hours! 

Goal of the game:

You must collect 4 soup cans per floor; doing so will unlock the floor's boss. There are four stages in total :) 

Challenges from the jam met:

  • Only use the default MS Paint color palette.
  • Draw your assets without a drawing tablet.
  • Try to make the title/logo without any real type/font.
